Articles.Content:
PROJECT STARLORD

https://www.facebook.com/projectstarlord

Welcome to the T3K Kerbal Space Program. Our continuing mission is to explore new worlds and ultimately build a space station on every planet.
 
Follow our progress on our Facebook Page. We have already successfully completely scanned Kerbal and the maps are now available for all to use as you will. More details to follow on mission design and, yes, the successful launch vehicles will be made available for everyone to share and develop!

If you want to chronicle your ingame mission progress, you should probably try the Mission Reports subforum.

I also recommend not to use facebook, because otherwise people without facebook accounts cannot view it.
I agree, better off in mission reports, moved.
